name: Sewer Adventures
description:
One of the games created during a gamejam hosted by Sweden Game Arena in collaboration with Tobii; an unfinished horror game that uses the eye tracker to achieve a scary feel.

How to Play:

  • Look at objects to pick them up
  • Look at doors to open them, some require a key to open.

Participants:

  • Niklas Lindblad - Programming
  • Simon Hedström - Programming
  • Lena Envall - Graphics
  • Niklas Bergwall - Graphics
  • Mattias Lindblad - Graphics
  • Gustav Rosberg - Graphics
  • Alex Andreasson - Graphics
  • Adrian van den Broëck - Audio
